title: support simulation on other planet (configure sky)

content.raw:
Originally disucssied #!/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-requests/124/add-apollo15_landing_site/diff#comment-5486424,
Currently gazebo display Moon image on the sky, but in some cases, we'd like to simulate a robot behavior on Moon or Mars where we should put Earth or Fhobos(?), so we need sdf element to use custom image instaed of SkyX_Moon.png

> you can modify SkyX_Moon.png with an image editing tool, paste a picture of earth over it and it should just work. The png file should be located in [install prefix]/share/gazebo-2.0/media/skyx/
content.html:
Originally disucssied #!/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-requests/124/add-apollo15_landing_site/diff#comment-5486424, Currently gazebo display Moon image on the sky, but in some cases, we'd like to simulate a robot behavior on Moon or Mars where we should put Earth or Fhobos(?), so we need sdf element to use custom image instaed of SkyX_Moon.png

you can modify SkyX_Moon.png with an image editing tool, paste a picture of earth over it and it should just work. The png file should be located in [install prefix]/share/gazebo-2.0/media/skyx/
